Class CPUSparseLinearAlgebraProvider<E>

java.lang.Object
org.jscience.mathematics.vector.backends.CPULinearAlgebraProvider<E>
org.jscience.mathematics.vector.backends.CPUSparseLinearAlgebraProvider<E>
Type Parameters:
E - the type of scalar elements
All Implemented Interfaces:
LinearAlgebraProvider<E>, ComputeBackend
public class CPUSparseLinearAlgebraProvider<E> extends CPULinearAlgebraProvider<E>
Linear Algebra Provider for Sparse Matrices (CPU).

Optimized for SparseMatrix implementations. Uses CSR-based algorithms that only process non-zero elements.

Since:
1.0
Author:
Silvere Martin-Michiellot, Gemini AI (Google DeepMind)
